First time I have published one of my maps. More versions to come.

Hey guys !
Today i show you the beginning of my work for Halloween !
Ignamarte and me are working on editing 4 maps.

All the information about this map are here :

http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/124944

What is new ?
- Lighting
- Custom texture
- Custom models
- New Hats
- Custom music

Thanks to Tophattwaffle who let me do it.

Happy  Halloween !

MAJORLY UPDATED CHECK THAT CHANGE LOG Change Log to Final
Changed TopHATT models to not block sight Fixed minor glitches Mixed unaligned textures Added sexy pic to disco Change Log
Better FPS in low FPS areas (Main Area, Pool, Ect) Made Secret room combo harder Added other secrets Fixed Minor glitches No glitches in any minigames New Big Cage New lighting in main room Removed Medic Added Medic Packs around the map Changed path of tunnel in big cage Fixed "Random Death" glitch This map is based on a nice, minimum security jail. every cell occupant should have a nice time! There are many things to do in this map, the file size is well worth it. Features: 72 Spawns Epic Pool Full outside Disco Many Mini games Full lighting Cubemaps Custom Skybox LOADS of custom textures! Mini games: Connect 4 Roulette Obstacle Course Last Reaction Joust Race Of Death Basketball Rock, Paper, Scissors Mini Game Breakdown: Connect 4: Its a normal game of Connect 4, you cannot cheat in this game. the first player to press a button goes first. you must decide who wins. there is no auto detect for this mini game. If players cheat you can reset the game with the lever in the middle. Roulette: There are 3 fenced in cages by the spinning roulette table. its a normal game of roulette with 1 winner! The left lever opens and closes the cells. The right lever Starts and Stops the spinning of the table. There is no auto detect for this game. the CTs must choose who dies. Obstacle Course: You start at the bottom of the stairs and RUN!!!! if you fall off you die. First one out wins! There is no auto detect for this game. CTs must choose who dies. Last Reaction (Now supports ANY number of players!): There are 16 booths, each with 4 buttons, and a control panel outside of the booths. The Ts enter a booth and are locked in. the CTs choose a color on the outside control panel and the same button lights up inside the booths. The last T to push his/her button dies. The lever to the left resets the game, or lets players out if they lock them selves in. Joust (2 Players only): A CT enters the blue tile side, and a T enters the red tile side. To start the game the CT pressed "Use" on the lever and both players are teleported into the game. The object of the game it to knife the player on the other side. to leave the game you must press "Use" on the lever under the joust rail. Race of Death (Ts only): The Ts enter the glow in the corner and wait until the game starts. to start the game a player preses "Use" on the lever outside of the race. the whole race walls will begin to move backwards killing any players that get suck. if you make it out alive you win! There is no reset for this game, if you start it you must wait for it to come back. Basket Ball (Ts Only): Do I really need to tell you how to play this? Rock Paper Scissors: A player steps on each side of the wall and choose a button. the loser dies. The reset switch is there for if the games stops working. If it does stop working, just press this lever and it will work again. Misc things around the map: Disco: full function disco that has 4 songs (1 secret) 7 lighting styles/effects. Fully stocked bar with shotty under the counter. A ct only area where the cts can sit back and enjoy the music without being knifed. Warden Nade: there is a warden nade that puts a TopHATT on your head to let people you are warden. There a many hats in this map. Only the warden hat is NOT a secret. Eletric sliding doors: these doors were installed in the main areas in the map. We ran out of money for all doors to be eletric. Pool: this pool was crafted by the gods them selves!!! It features all rounded edges on the wall and in the pool. The sun casts a glow down upon this price of art like a beacon in the night. Cells: each cell is just a tad bit diffrent to keep it fun. There are many things to knife wile waiting for orders. Or you can throw your tv at the CTs!!! There is no USP in any cell it's a compact!!! Cell vent: I was tired of the teleport 1st cell vent. So I did a roof vent with. Drip down ladder that you climb to reach the top of vent then walk through the vent to the armory!!! Medic: this medic was fine until two unrule players threw thier beds on the floor! There is 1 nade in medic. And all beds heal you. Just stand by one!!! LABLES!!: nearly everything is labled. It's hard to not find what you are looking for in this map!

Hey guys, Thanks for downloading hope you enjoy it! :) Fpsbanana has given me errors for the past million times upon trying to add the map and it thinks its funny makin me re-write everything. :/ Anyways have fun. :) If you would like to use it on your server, I would be honored. Hit me up on gmail and let me know! Carsonbmt@gmail.com

 Feedback please! Leave a comment on the fpsbanana page though. I'm no super mapper so don't go too hard on me ;) And make it constructive!

My idea for the jail came from a really nice jail located in Leoben, Austria (Ikea Jail). There was really only one goal, games, games and lots of games. I'm sure most of you have been frustrated as a T when all you play is couch game, trivia and maybe a maze. This map has been designed to amuse as many people as possible.

This is the updated version, I had to delete the original because I couldn't upload. This is currently being played on EdgeGamers servers even with its large size it plays fast and the balance seems pretty good (CTs can easily control Ts but if they make a mistake, they get punished).  Minimal lag issues at beginning of round when run with a full 40 man server (disappears shortly after jails cells open), otherwise with 30 people it runs incredibly smooth.  

This was made for EdgeGamers jail server but I can make a version for you if you contact me.  I believe it has 20 or so CT spawns and 48 T spawns.  

********Requires NOBLOCK otherwise mini-games will not function correctly as Ts who fail will warp into one giant cluster.  

Features
* Obstacle Course - Easy and hard version
* Indoor Race - With team auto-sort option (go into teleporter, automatically generates two teams)
* Outdoor Race - Fast and Easy
* Skipping Rope - Jump or the rope kills you!  Thanks to Elfy, mg_hellz_multigame for the idea
* Dodgeball - Cannon shoots stuff at you - avoid it!  Thanks to solid_snake_glenn original map for the idea
* Soccer/Basketball
* Deathrun - Easy and Hard Version 
* Climb - Fairly easy, but that's the point!  

Other Rooms
* Disco - 3 Songs + Secret Mode
* Couch Room - Everyone loves couches. Everyone.
* Execution Rooms - Gas, Fire, Giant Pit of Death

Cool Feature
* ST C4- If you get special treatment you can get a special C4 block to mark your status. Has a trail and an overhead graphics so you can avoid being killed. CTs are the only ones who can open the room.  Special treatment is letting a T do what they want after being freekilled or for winning something
* Random Gun Spawn - Small Chance of spawning two pistols (10%)

Minor Bugs:
*16 ton blocks in deathrun kills people when blocks go back up
*Pool water doesn't drown players

Credits	
turboagent	           16tonne weight
harrison burton	   Death Stairs
-|tdd|-kamikaze    Florescent Lights
Sillirion                 Traps

As promised here is the(almost) complete version of my jail map...

the map got a little bigger than i was imagining but who played 
said it`s worth downloading :D

I tried to make the map very real with le parkour passages, so
if you think you can get on somewhere there is a way (that 
is one of the reasons that i made the map dark because if the 
tr climb somewhere he can disappear).
As most of the people dont find out how to get up somewhere and 
even how to play in the map i am making some videos to explain.
(ill post them here as soon as i finish)

the playable area of the map is finished. The only thing that i
was planning to do was to make a 3d skybox and add more detail
but as the map is too big i am still thinking about it...

I recommend that you play the map with
mp_roundtime set to 8 because if someone escape the cts will need a lot of time to find him

And, about the sewers, every cell on the first floor
have a passage to it but only one is breakable(set randomly
every round)

well, that`s it i hope you like the map, sorry about the bad english and
please, if you have any suggestions and/or if you find any bugs
please tell me so i can fix in the final version.

This was my first map and as everybody first's map it was full of bugs... then i decided to forget it and start another map, but some of my friends said that the gameplay was good and the map was fun to play on.
because of that i decided to continue the map and fix the bugs(only gameplay ones because i need a feedback before wasting time on fixing bugs if nobody is going to play it xP).

well... that's it hope you like it :D



if u like the map im planning for the final version:

-fix all the bugs
-add a granade war minigame
-improve fps
-improve the deathrun
-add more "levels" for the "chairs dance"(the current version only supports one survivor...)
-add details to the map
-change some textures


sorry for the bad english... im brazilian

Here is the laser v4b!! I hope you will enjoy it ;) This map is a fix of laser_v4 bugs caused by the Major Update of CS:S to Orange Box. If you want to edit this map I would like you to ask me for permission. Never use this names: ba_jail_laser_v5, v6, v7... only ba_jail_laser_[whateveryouwant] I remember when I was noob at mapping (xD) and I released the laser v1, people liked it and I keeped updating it. Now, one year later, I have learned a lot of things in Hammer Editor and Source Level Designing and I tried to apply all my knowledge of mapping in this map, especially on the disco. Some textures have been changed and the lighting environment is better.
Fixes >> The lasers cause damage again (trigger_hurt) >> The Disco buttons were working bad because since the update the buttons with playerclip texture don't work properly. I just changed the textures to invisible. >> I changed the Disco Songs.
Screenshots ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Disco Web Player In the disco you can Turn Off everything, set the dance floor black, and turn On the strobe light, you will like the effect :) General Web Player All the map Web Player If you liked the map vote it!!

Here is the laser v4!! I hope you will enjoy it ;) SINCE CSS MAJOR UPDATE THE DISCO BUTTONS SEEMS TO DONT WORK PROPERLY :( If you want to edit this map I would like you to ask me for permission. Never use this names: ba_jail_laser_v5, v6, v7... only ba_jail_laser_[whateveryouwant] I remember when I was noob at mapping (xD) and I released the laser v1, people liked it and I keeped updating it. Now, one year later, I have learned a lot of things in Hammer Editor and Source Level Designing and I tried to apply all my knowledge of mapping in this map, especially on the disco. Some textures have been changed and the lighting environment is better.
I fixed some glitches of laser v3 >> When CTs leave the roulette room, a deagle and m4a1 set is given to them. >> When 2 members of the same team leave the roulette room at the same time, they won't stuck because there are 2 teleport destination alternating. >> The cells that have func_wall_toggle: when you press the button for toggle the wall, players who are in the middle will be teleported back into the cell, so they won't stuck. >> Now people can't shoot players that are playing a roulette from the roulette waiting room. >> When you press one of the two buttons for opening the cells with colored lights, all cells in the map will open (only the first press each round). >> Now it can be played with 48 players.
Screenshots ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Disco Web Player In the disco you can Turn Off everything, set the dance floor black, and turn On the strobe light, you will like the effect :) General Web Player All the map Web Player If you liked the map vote it!!

This map is an edited version of the ba_jail_electric_large jail break map.  I have added light to it which makes it look better (in my opinion).  I have also created more secret spots in this map which I think makes game play much more enjoyable.  A big thing I have done in this map was create 2 mini games.  One is a race where the first person to press the button at the end kills the rest of the T's and gets last request.  The other one is a jump rope game where when you touch the bar you will get teleported to a small cage where the ct's could let you go free or shock you to your death.

Please rate and comment I want to know what you guys think.  This is my first time editing a map and I want to get better at it.

Created By: [SG] Bullet Wound
Released: Nov.16/2012
Version: Revamped_V2

Changes:
- Moved/Enlarged Medic
- Changed Bathroom into shower room (it was unused)
- Armoury door now opens for CTs on the outside of it when they get near it
- Made jump pillars easier
- Changed a secret
- Added a watermelon (removed 4 bananas to please the watermelon lord)
- Made soccer glass thinner to make it less bullet proof
- Made soccer field bigger
- Made soccer nets less pathetic
- Made disco songs louder

- Add a secret

- Made kitchen entrances wider

After 3 Months of development, bugs, engine update, reflections, and this shits that happened with all mappers, the beta version of kistroll prison is done, and avaliable for download now !

MAP UPLOADED TO GAMEBANANA !

(no more multiupload link)

The Features: ? 60 Player Spawns
       ? 12 CT        ? 48 TR

? 22 Prisoner Cells
       ? 20 Dual Cells (Two TR per Cell)
       ? 2 Qua' Cells (Four TR per Cell)

? Weapon Room
       ? 12 CT Spawn Points
       ? 3 Pistols Choose
       ? 8 Primary Weapon Choose
       ? Granades

? Localization Signs

? Solitary Cell

? Refectory
       ? 9 Tables

? Kitchen

? Soccer Area
       ? Ball Model
       ? Score System

? Pool Area
       ? Big Pool with Nice Design
       ? Mini-Pool with Bubbles
       ? Sauna
       ? Shower

? Big Jail

? Disco
       ? SetList:
               ? Basshunter - Tetris [Trace Remix]
               ? RIO - Serenade
               ? Electrixx - Tetris
               ? Underneath - DJ Antoine
               ? Gunther - Ding Dong Song
               ? Far East Movement - Like a G6
       ? A Lot of Effects
       ? Nice Design

? Games
       ? Fork vs You:
               ? Two Players will Control 2 Forks,
               the rest of players will run around
               the place to escape of the fork damage

       ? Don't Stop Jump:
               ? One Player will press the button,
               and the rest will stay in blue area,
               for 75 seconds, you can't stop jump,
               or you will die !

       ? Tic Tac Toe:
               ? The most epic game, tic tac toe :D

       ? Race
               ? One Player will press the button,
               the sound will play, in 3 seconds,
               3 players will run to the finish,
               the first player that have pressed
               the finish button, will win !
       ? Basket

       ? Spray:
               ? Two Concrete Walls for the epic Battle of Sprays.

       ? Jump!:
               ? One Player will press the button
               on control room, after 5 seconds,
               the wall and the floor will break,
               the first player that have finish
               the course of pillars will win,
               and the rest will die 'cause
               the pillars will break.

Thanks for reading, please leave your feedback, and RATE !

--- ba_jail_hussa_v1 ---

- Created by Slasher/Hussa.

This Map's based on 2 'rooms'.

The Main Room (huge): It contains:
-Cells (T-Spawn)
-CT Spawn
-Pool
-Watchtower
-Race
-Football
-Massjail
-Healroom

It also includes 2 Shafts, 2 USP's in 2 different Cells, 1 at the Pool.

The secondary Room: It contains mainly a disco, a healroom, a Shooting Range, a killing room (rotating Blades).

It also includes an USP in the healroom.

________________________


In the Map was put a secret, well, only 2 guys know how to open it, and nobody will know it in further.
It's just a room where the one who opened it can kill all by spawning props.
So it's not usefull for jail.
It just was made for the lulz. (:

Special Thanks for Fannboii for testing it on his Jail Server (only German):
83.169.44.129:27015

Youre welcome to visit us, if you are german. :P

Also thanks to KILLERWHALEOWNEDYOU for his Shooting Range Prefab which you can find here: http://www.fpsbanana.com/prefabs/5259

________________________

WARNING: This map is as much optimazed as it was possible to do for me.
But this doesn't mean you got high FPS everywhere, you really don't.
If ur at the end of the pool and look onto the whole main room, you get fps like 20-30. Not more.
This shouldn't effect the gameplay but it's not nice though.

Further Versions will come where i'm going to higher the FPS, trying different ways.

________________________

If your' going to use this Map on ur server, it would be nice if you'd inform me.
I'd like to visit the Server when the Map is on and hear what players are going to say about it/getting ideas for improvements, i'm always open for suggestions.

So that's it till now, i hope you enjoy.
You may rate and comment here. (:

Peace out,

Slasher.

It's an edited version of the map "ba_jail_hellzprison". It have random weapon spawns and a random ventilation shaft system. I improve the performence and I think it looks now better.

It've that low FPS because i have a very bad system :(

Updated 1.1: Barbed wire do now damage, nodraw-bug fixed, all awp's and autosniper's replaced with scout's.

Updated 1.2: Shorter name the old was too long, the crash cause the shield should be fixed.

Updated 1.3: Barbed wire do now lesser damage, the sewer have now water and a new ventilation shaft from a cell has being added.

Updated 1.4: Grenade Spawner added, AK47 added, Glock's replaced with Fivesevens's some cupemaps added and builded.

Updated 1.5: Rules in German added, Trap removed

Updated 1.6: You can now escape in the escape cell, rules texturebug fixed.

PS: I know it's very bad english sry
